The goal of  `co2fluxtent` is to provide the tools to analyze net ecosystem exchange (NEE) and transpiration (T) and evapotranspiration (ET) with their own LiCOR 7500 data.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pkg_install("PaulESantos/co2fluxtent")
```

### example
```r
df <- read_files("./inst/extdata")
data <- df |> 
  flux_calc()
data |> 
  dplyr::mutate(filename = basename(filename)) 
```

 - The default calculation is 'ET'.
